title: How to Make Turkish Delight Ice Cream

steps.headline: Cut the Turkish delight.
steps.description: Cut into very small cubes. Once frozen these will become chewy, so they need to be small for easy eating.

steps.headline: Stand the vanilla ice cream on the bench briefly to allow it to soften just a little.
steps.description: Stir in the chopped Turkish delight pieces and flavoured water thoroughly. Do this quickly and return the ice cream to the freezer immediately.

steps.headline: Allow to harden for at least half an hour.
Serve.
steps.description: This goes well with a rosewater or orange flower syrup for the complete Turkish flavour theme.

text: Cut the Turkish delight. Cut into very small cubes. Once frozen these will become chewy, so they need to be small for easy eating. Stand the vanilla ice cream on the bench briefly to allow it to soften just a little. Stir in the chopped Turkish delight pieces and flavoured water thoroughly. Do this quickly and return the ice cream to the freezer immediately. Allow to harden for at least half an hour.  Serve. This goes well with a rosewater or orange flower syrup for the complete Turkish flavour theme.
